content: creates the instep and you will have 9 11 chain loops up each side of the instep extension with full respect to all the hard working and inventive knitters out there i attach the following statement of pattern download use and respect by downloading and using my pattern you agree to abide by the following terms of use this pattern is freely given to knitters for respectful use the pattern is not to be sold is not to be knit for commercial gain and the pattern is not to be used for teaching in a class or book for which money is charged without written permission from the designer you can of course blog or post the item you knit using this pattern i am excited to be part of the respective exchange of knitting information and designs and contribute this pattern in the spirit of respectful sharing i can be contacted at stella@baughen net i blog at www knitknitfrog blogspot com and i am knitfrogknit on ravelry
